terra.shell.utils.system

Class Variables

  • java.lang.Object
    • terra.shell.utils.system.Variables

  • public final class Variables
extends java.lang.Object
    Resource class which holds Variables defined within the JVM.
    Author:
    dan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Variables()

      Clears the Variable defined with this String.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Variables

        public Variables()

    • Method Detail

      • setVar

        public static void setVar(Variable var)
        Sets the Variable. This replaces any variable previously with the same Variable.getName(); value.
        Parameters:
        var - Variable to be set.

      • clearVar

        public static void clearVar(java.lang.String var)
        Clears the Variable defined with this String. The String needs to match the variables Variable.getName(); value as this is what defines the variable.
        Parameters:
        var - Matching Variable to clear.

      • getVars

        public static java.util.Enumeration<Variable> getVars()
        Get all variables currently in the system.
        Returns:
        An enumeration of all variables currently defined in system.

      • getVarValue

        public static java.lang.String getVarValue(java.lang.String var)
        Get the value specified by that Variable.
        Parameters:
        var - The Variable name to access.
        Returns:
        The Variables actual value.
